title: [Large-scale] Qualitative Research Integrated Analysis through Peer Learning Interactions

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level professional (medical/legal/technical) foundational knowledge and basic understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: A course for mid-level professionals in online non-real-time environments to master qualitative research data analysis through peer interaction. Actively uses collaborative tools within the LMS via digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peers to systematically categorize qualitative research data and derive thematic patterns.
Learners can critically evaluate and revise their analytical conclusions based on peer feedback in online environments.
Learners can integrate interdisciplinary research perspectives through interactions with peers from diverse professional backgrounds.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
